title: Senior Python Backend Engineer
description: We're looking for an experienced Python backend engineer to join our growing team. You'll be responsible for designing and implementing scalable microservices architecture for our AI-powered platform. The ideal candidate has strong experience with Python, Django, AWS, and containerization technologies.
requirements: 5+ years of Python development experience, Strong knowledge of Django or Flask, Experience with AWS services (EC2, S3, Lambda, RDS), Docker and Kubernetes expertise, PostgreSQL or similar relational database experience, Experience with RESTful API design, Strong problem-solving skills, Excellent communication abilities
